Author: throowawway6969
Text: I use lose it premium to track. For me I dont think its my stomach I think it's just a mental thing where I would like to eat more but I... cant?? Big L . I also feel super dummy but I'm tryina be nicer 2 myself about it.

Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: it IS ass- I'm also going for 2 pounds a week (do you use Fitbit to track?) and I'm literally over here mad at myself because I KNOW more than a pound a week is unhealthy but I've shrunk my stomach so now I can't eat a lot without feeling sick and my heart rate is often concerningly low. I feel like an idiot for continuing to do this to myself.
